logger.doc:name: Start Log
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { appName: app.name, flowName : flow.name, position: "Flow Start", message: "To insert records into Salesforce", correlationId: correlationId, timestamp: now() >> "UTC" }]

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "success": (payload.items filter ((item, index) -> item.successful ~= 'true')).id, "failed": (payload.items filter ((item, index) -> item.successful ~= 'false')).message }

logger.doc:name: End Log
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { appName: app.name, flowName : flow.name, position: "Flow end", message: payload, correlationId: correlationId, timestamp: now() >> "UTC" }]
